title: MoonRise Tokenomics
intro: MoonRise was designed with structure to ensure balance, transparency, and sustainable growth. No token was given away for free — everything was planned with purpose, strategy, and long-term vision. Auditable execution on-chain, with no airdrops and no additional token creation.
distributionNote: Every fraction has a clear destination. Nothing is left over, nothing missing — only strategy and execution proven in code.
fundsText: Every resource is allocated with full traceability. Each contribution strengthens the ecosystem, ensures stability, and drives sustainable growth.

funds.title: MoonRise Ecosystem
funds.desc: Constant reinvestment in technology, products, and global expansion. Network growth returns as real value.

funds.title: Stability Reserves
funds.desc: Strategic reserve that protects against volatility and maintains healthy liquidity in any scenario.

funds.title: Market Liquidity
funds.desc: Robust liquidity ensuring safe, stable trading with real depth.

funds.title: Holder Appreciation
funds.desc: Smart execution that turns stability into real appreciation for every holder.

closing.phrase: 100% public and auditable execution. No extra token creation. Transparency and locks enforced in code.
